Topic.Title: Should there be a call to JS.scrollToEnd() in the OutputTextNoBr() script?

Posts.EditableText:
I'm looking at a pull request to add `JS.scrollToEnd()` at the end of the `OutputTextNoBr()` script.

It kinda seems like a good idea; it sorta sounds like a bad idea; but mostly it seems like it would usually not have any noticeable effect.

Comments or suggestions?

---

Posts.HTML:
I'm looking at a pull request to add JS.scrollToEnd() at the end of the OutputTextNoBr() script.

It kinda seems like a good idea; it sorta sounds like a bad idea; but mostly it seems like it would usually not have any noticeable effect.

Comments or suggestions?
